shopifyProduct.title: Panthera TEC MAT
shopifyProduct.description: A new level of Incident light microscope for material sciences: Panthera TEC MAT BD-T is a Trinocular microscope with a set of BF/DF Plan Achromatic and Semi-Apo objectives, working with UC eyepieces of 22mm Field of View. The hard-coated stage has a travel range of 6”x4”. A 3W LED smart segmental ring light in a compact setup with Field- and Aperture diaphragm can easily be changed to different color temperatures. The integrated Transmitted light system is based on a clever condenser concept and allows to treat compound materials. The Motic LightTracer system with memory function, a built-in Low-Energy mode and an LED feedback indicator helps to optimize your workflow. Note: Products in photos are 6"x4" models Downloads Catalog Specifications – BF (6"x4") Specifications – BD (6"x3") Specifications – BF-T (6"x4") Specifications – BD-T (6"x4")
shopifyProduct.descriptionHtml:
A new level of Incident light microscope for material sciences: Panthera TEC MAT BD-T is a Trinocular microscope with a set of BF/DF Plan Achromatic and Semi-Apo objectives, working with UC eyepieces of 22mm Field of View. The hard-coated stage has a travel range of 6”x4”. A 3W LED smart segmental ring light in a compact setup with Field- and Aperture diaphragm can easily be changed to different color temperatures. The integrated Transmitted light system is based on a clever condenser concept and allows to treat compound materials. The Motic LightTracer system with memory function, a built-in Low-Energy mode and an LED feedback indicator helps to optimize your workflow.

Note: Products in photos are 6"x4" models
